CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1952, pg. 6, reads: "At Beltzhoover Benefit - When the Palsetta Club of Beltzhoover held its annual benefit show for the Community Chest Drive at Knoxville Junior High School last Wednesday, among those how took part were, left to right: Imelda Deda Segina, 233 Fourth Street, Rankin, who did a toe tap, flag twirl and acrobatic number; Leon Daniels, singer, and Gloria Sciulli, Glen Caladh Street, Hazelwood, singer and toe dance. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Imelda Deda Segina, Leon Daniels, and Gloria Sciulli, standing in front of light colored curtain in Knoxville Junior High School for Community Chest Drive benefit show
